review: This is a truly amazing device. The only reason it did not get 5 stars is its some times glitchy nature.After a very simple install and startup, I would get error messages about slow internet connection. I had expected this as we were running basic ATT internet. We had ATT come out and install a midrange uverse package (6 whatabites) and the stick preformed much better. We still do get the occasional slow or lost internet signal, but I'm starting to wonder if it is the connection, as in almost all instances I can clear the issue by resetting the Fire stick. That said, so far I'm very pleased with the programming content and the fact that a good portion of it is free with my Amazon Prime membership.
